metadata.title: CVE-2024-38607 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  macintosh/via-macii: Fix "BUG: sleeping function called from invalid context"  The via-macii ADB driver calls request_irq() after disabling hard interrupts. But disabling interrupts isn't necessary here because the VIA shift register interrupt was masked during VIA1 initialization.
